text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: tataH prayAtaH kaunteyaH krameNa bharatarSabha
text.ur: tataḥ prayātaḥ kaunteyaḥ krameṇa bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: nandAm aparanandAM ca nadyau pApabhayApahe
text.ur: nandām aparanandāṁ ca nadyau pāpabhayāpahe

text.ascii: sa parvataM samAsAdya hemakUTam anAmayam
text.ur: sa parvataṁ samāsādya hemakūṭam anāmayam

text.ascii: acintyAn adbhutAn bhAvAn dadarza subahUn nRpaH
text.ur: acintyān adbhutān bhāvān dadarśa subahūn nr̥paḥ

text.ascii: vAco yatrAbhavan meghA upalAz ca sahasrazaH
text.ur: vāco yatrābhavan meghā upalāś ca sahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: nAzaknuvaMs tam AroDhuM viSaNNamanaso janAH
text.ur: nāśaknuvaṁs tam āroḍhuṁ viṣaṇṇamanaso janāḥ

text.ascii: vAyur nityaM vavau yatra nityaM devaz ca varSati
text.ud: वायुर्नित्यं ववौ यत्र नित्यं देवश्च वर्षति
text.ur: vāyur nityaṁ vavau yatra nityaṁ devaś ca varṣati

text.ascii: sAyaM prAtaz ca bhagavAn dRzyate havyavAhanaH
text.ur: sāyaṁ prātaś ca bhagavān dr̥śyate havyavāhanaḥ

text.ascii: evaM bahuvidhAn bhAvAn adbhutAn vIkSya pANDavaH
text.ur: evaṁ bahuvidhān bhāvān adbhutān vīkṣya pāṇḍavaḥ

text.ascii: lomazaM punar eva sma paryapRcchat tad adbhutam
text.ur: lomaśaṁ punar eva sma paryapr̥cchat tad adbhutam

text.ascii: lomaza uvAca
text.ur: lomaśa uvāca

text.ascii: yathAzrutam idaM pUrvam asmAbhir arikarzana
text.ur: yathāśrutam idaṁ pūrvam asmābhir arikarśana

text.ascii: tad ekAgramanA rAjan nibodha gadato mama
text.ur: tad ekāgramanā rājan nibodha gadato mama

text.ascii: asminn RSabhakUTe 'bhUd RSabho nAma tApasaH
text.ur: asminn r̥ṣabhakūṭe ’bhūd r̥ṣabho nāma tāpasaḥ

text.ascii: anekazatavarSAyus tapasvI kopano bhRzam
text.ur: anekaśatavarṣāyus tapasvī kopano bhr̥śam

text.ascii: sa vai saMbhASyamANo 'nyaiH kopAd girim uvAca ha
text.ur: sa vai saṁbhāṣyamāṇo ’nyaiḥ kopād girim uvāca ha

text.ascii: ya iha vyAharet kaz cid upalAn utsRjes tadA
text.ur: ya iha vyāharet kaś cid upalān utsr̥jes tadā

text.ascii: vAtaM cAhUya mA zabdam ity uvAca sa tApasaH
text.ud: वातं चाहूय मा शब्दमित्युवाच स तापसः
text.ur: vātaṁ cāhūya mā śabdam ity uvāca sa tāpasaḥ

text.ascii: vyAharaMz caiva puruSo meghena vinivAryate
text.ur: vyāharaṁś caiva puruṣo meghena vinivāryate

text.ascii: evam etAni karmANi rAjaMs tena maharSiNA
text.ur: evam etāni karmāṇi rājaṁs tena maharṣiṇā

text.ascii: kRtAni kAni cit kopAt pratiSiddhAni kAni cit
text.ur: kr̥tāni kāni cit kopāt pratiṣiddhāni kāni cit

text.ascii: nandAm abhigatAn devAn purA rAjann iti zrutiH
text.ur: nandām abhigatān devān purā rājann iti śrutiḥ

text.ascii: anvapadyanta sahasA puruSA devadarzinaH
text.ur: anvapadyanta sahasā puruṣā devadarśinaḥ

text.ascii: te darzanam anicchanto devAH zakrapurogamAH
text.ur: te darśanam anicchanto devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ

text.ascii: durgaM cakrur imaM dezaM giripratyUharUpakam
text.ur: durgaṁ cakrur imaṁ deśaṁ giripratyūharūpakam

text.ascii: tadA prabhRti kaunteya narA girim imaM sadA
text.ud: तदा प्रभृति कौन्तेय नरा गिरिमिमं सदा
text.ur: tadā prabhr̥ti kaunteya narā girim imaṁ sadā

text.ascii: nAzaknuvan abhidraSTuM kuta evAdhirohitum
text.ur: nāśaknuvan abhidraṣṭuṁ kuta evādhirohitum

text.ascii: nAtaptatapasA zakyo draSTum eSa mahAgiriH
text.ur: nātaptatapasā śakyo draṣṭum eṣa mahāgiriḥ

text.ascii: AroDhuM vApi kaunteya tasmAn niyatavAg bhava
text.ur: āroḍhuṁ vāpi kaunteya tasmān niyatavāg bhava

text.ascii: iha devAH sadA sarve yajJAn Ajahrur uttamAn
text.ur: iha devāḥ sadā sarve yajñān ājahrur uttamān

text.ascii: teSAm etAni liGgAni dRzyante 'dyApi bhArata
text.ur: teṣām etāni liṅgāni dr̥śyante ’dyāpi bhārata

text.ascii: kuzAkAreva dUrveyaM saMstIrNeva ca bhUr iyam
text.ur: kuśākāreva dūrveyaṁ saṁstīrṇeva ca bhūr iyam

text.ascii: yUpaprakArA bahavo vRkSAz ceme vizAM pate
text.ur: yūpaprakārā bahavo vr̥kṣāś ceme viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: devAz ca RSayaz caiva vasanty adyApi bhArata
text.ur: devāś ca r̥ṣayaś caiva vasanty adyāpi bhārata

text.ascii: teSAM sAyaM tathA prAtar dRzyate havyavAhanaH
text.ur: teṣāṁ sāyaṁ tathā prātar dr̥śyate havyavāhanaḥ

text.ascii: ihAplutAnAM kaunteya sadyaH pApmA vihanyate
text.ur: ihāplutānāṁ kaunteya sadyaḥ pāpmā vihanyate

text.ascii: kuruzreSThAbhiSekaM vai tasmAt kuru sahAnujaH
text.ur: kuruśreṣṭhābhiṣekaṁ vai tasmāt kuru sahānujaḥ

text.ascii: tato nandAplutAGgas tvaM kauzikIm abhiyAsyasi
text.ur: tato nandāplutāṅgas tvaṁ kauśikīm abhiyāsyasi

text.ascii: vizvAmitreNa yatrograM tapas taptam anuttamam
text.ur: viśvāmitreṇa yatrograṁ tapas taptam anuttamam

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: tatas tatra samAplutya gAtrANi sagaNo nRpaH
text.ur: tatas tatra samāplutya gātrāṇi sagaṇo nr̥paḥ

text.ascii: jagAma kauzikIM puNyAM ramyAM zivajalAM nadIm
text.ud: जगाम कौशिकीं पुण्यां रम्यां शिवजलां नदीम्
text.ur: jagāma kauśikīṁ puṇyāṁ ramyāṁ śivajalāṁ nadīm
